representations.shortDescr: This role allows the user to view some system resources.
This role must be assigned to everyone who needs to appear in Sales Representative drop lists
Assigned to all new users to access publicly available functionality.

Capture and manage all student applications and admissions. Includes vetting applications, handling enquiries and/or changing the status of an application. Managing agreements and scholarships. Reporting on Application.
Captures and maintains programmes, courses, offerings/intakes. Includes capturing marketing information of the programme or course. Reporting on programme, courses and offering/intakes.
Capture and manage all student enrolments, course/module selections. Discontinue or resume program or course enrolments. Reporting on Enrolments.
Oversee the student finance on financial dashboard, reports or per offering. Manage student’s finances.
Capture programme and course fees. Process student finances. Transaction capturing. Handle enquiries. Create and maintain vouchers. Manage accounts.
Process student results by capturing or import student assessment and course results. Maintain, release and finalize results. Handle enquiries.
Oversee the student results with functions to view or maintain a student’s results. Approve result outcomes. Issue certificates. Reports on results.

Maintain all configurations or system settings of the system. Manage user permissions by creating  new users, deactivating existing users, assigning or removing users roles. Create and maintain organisational structures.
